translation: Yylhi zmyn pnnhi pvur shdt san hilavnh yiyih.
Th zmyn chahkhi pnnụ̄ sạry andrim bar nybr.
Th ansan vanhi zi aath kya chuh yih spdan?
Tamhi doh kri so (pans pytth guzrymtụ̄) ḥalat byan.
Tikyazi tuhndụ̄ rbn āshi tas (yih krnuk) ḥkm diytmut.
Tamhi doh phyrn lukh byvn byvn ḥalts mnz takhi tihndụ̄ aʿmal yin timn havnh.
Pth yymụ̄ dhras brabr nyky āshi krmcz suh vuchhhi tath.
Th yymụ̄ dhrs brabr bdy āshi krmcz suh vuchhhi tath.
